column1: SPATIALFLOW SPATIAL LAYOUT INPUT — House #415 Mediterranean (84'1" × 60')
LARGEST SITE OF 3 PLANS — Dual garage, two-story voids, clay tile roof, and Mediterranean stucco create complex multi-trade staging requirements

column10: Spatial Priority Note
LVL beam package must be with lumber co. week 1 — long lead item
Large site. Establish South access road first. Spoil East – away from entry porch zone
Dual service entry for large home. Gas, water, sewer, electric – coordinate
84'×60' = 5,040 SF excavation. Many dump truck cycles. Route: East access only
Large perimeter – multiple pump positions may be needed. South + West setup
Block walls + poured sections. Stage block East, concrete trucks South
938 SF garage slab. West pump position. Keep South approach clear for trucks
LARGEST pour of project. 2 pumps needed. All other site access BLOCKED pour day
2×6 exterior walls full perimeter. Crane South-Center. Stage lumber South
LVL beams long and heavy. Crane critical. Sequence: Great Room beam → Foyer beam → garage headers
18'×8' two-car header is very long. West crane position for garage
Radius stair in two-story void. Complex framing – lumber co. plans required
Joists long – East staging 20ft clear. Crane active Wks 13-15
Interior scaffold for two-story void framing. Separate from exterior crane
Crane still active. No staging under crane swing arc
Heaviest roof load of all 3 plans. Clay tile – structural engineer verify before delivery
3-coat Mediterranean stucco. Scaffold full perimeter. Material route: gaps at South only
Mediterranean columns heavy. Small crane or forklift. Scaffold still active on walls
Stage South-Center. Heavy stone. Forklift must access entry zone while scaffold active on walls
Alder door fragile – deliver just-in-time. Scaffold gaps for window pass-through
7-8 stair options. Third optional. Coordinate with front porch masonry completion
Master bath has 2 shower heads, wet bar. Large scope. Start inside while scaffold active outside
Attic HVAC unit over garage – crane to lift. Coordinate with roof completion
200A+ panel. Chandelier provision in foyer rotunda – rough-in before ceiling close
R27 for 2×6 walls. Attic insulation over garage zone critical for energy
Large home – big drywall delivery. Two-story rooms need interior scaffold
Coffered + rotunda + tray ceilings all happening Wks 23-25. Scaffold shared resource – sequence carefully
Heavy stone tile. Deliver per room. Protect subfloor during delivery
Mosaic detail requires specialist. Sequence: tile → pedestal → fixtures
Install LAST in bedroom sequence. After all other trades complete in zone
Chandelier heavy + fragile. Scaffold still needed. Install after drywall + paint complete
Mediterranean landscape. After all exterior work complete. Do not disturb porch areas
